name: Manjaro Awesome WM Respin
short_description:
THIS PROJECT HAS MOVED TO: https://sourceforge.net/projects/manjarodev/files/users/culinax/awesome/

____________________________________________________

Manjaro Awesome WM Respin -codenamed Cesious- is a respin of Manjaro Linux. It uses the very powerful dynamic tiling window manager 'awesome'. It is mainly targetted at people who are new to tiling WMs, or experienced people who want to have a fully functional system after the installation.

Links.
Forum Thread - http://forum.manjaro.org/index.php?topic=7315.0
Code - https://github.com/Culinax/manjaro-awesome-respin
Manjaro Linux - http://manjaro.org/
awesome - http://awesome.naquadah.org
summary: A Manjaro Linux respin based on the popular 'awesome window manager'
